yelawolf: i must be jim morrison to get a motherfucking girl like you dont know what i did in my past life but it must have been something cool cause im a whiskey drinking fight provoking cigarette smoking dude i got a problem with my attitude its hard for me to keep cool but when i look at you i see me a reflection of a real soul so pardon me if i may seem loose and out of control it aint the drink talking its me talking; fuck if everyone knows you my girl and thats that so hop on the back of this bike and roll lets roll now
